Class MocksyServer

java.lang.Object

public class MocksyServer
extends Object

HTTP server to process Mocksy requests.

Author:
Saleem Shafi

MocksyServer

public MocksyServer(Ruleset rules,

Create a server that will process request with the given Ruleset and running on the given port.

Parameters:

          throws Exception

Throws:
Exception - if server cannot be shutdown

setupRequestConnector

protected org.mortbay.jetty.Connector setupRequestConnector()
Creates the main request-processing connector on the appropriate port. If the keystore is specified and valid, the port will use SSL.

Returns:
the main connector

setupAdminConnector

protected org.mortbay.jetty.Connector setupAdminConnector()
Creates the admin connector on the next port after the main one.

Returns:
the admin connector
